name: Plant an App, Inc.
description: Developer of a low-code cloud-based platform designed to facilitate rapid development and deployment of web applications. The company's platform allows information technology teams to translate their work, ideas, and processes into software with advanced code and orchestrating apps created by business users, enabling small and medium-sized businesses to create, edit, and manage web apps online with little to no coding knowledge.
one_liner: Developer of a low-code cloud-based platform designed to facilitate rapid development and deployment of web applications. The company's platform allows information technology teams to translate their work, ideas, and processes into software with advanced code and orchestrating apps created by business users, enabling small and medium-sized businesses to create, edit, and manage web apps online with little to no coding knowledge.
